class.name: com.simplysoftware.OshiMonitor.OshiMonitor
class.comment: OshiMonitor library for B4J. Uses the OSHI library to monitor CPU, RAM, and Temperature.

method.name: hasCpuTemp
method.comment: Returns true if CPU temperature monitoring is supported.

method.name: Start
method.comment: Starts the background monitoring thread. Raises Updated, CpuUsage, CpuTemp and RamUsage events at the configured interval.

method.name: Stop
method.comment: Stops the monitoring thread. The object remains initialized and can be restarted with Start.

method.name: ListProcesses
method.comment: Returns a List of unique running process names, sorted A–Z.

method.name: ResetProcessMaximums
method.comment: Resets the tracked maximum CPU and RAM values for the target process to zero.

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Returns true if the object has been initialized and not yet killed.

method.name: ResetMaximums
method.comment: Resets the tracked maximum CPU and RAM values for the system to zero.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the monitor and prepares OSHI hardware access.

method.name: Kill
method.comment: Kills the ba object reference to free memory and stops the thread cleanly. After calling this, IsInitialized will return false.

property.name: IntervalMs
property.comment: Sets the update interval in milliseconds. Values lower than 100ms are clamped to 100ms.

property.name: RamTotalMB
property.comment: Returns total physical memory in megabytes.

property.name: MaxProcessRamUsage
property.comment: Returns the highest Process RAM usage percentage recorded.

property.name: RamUsage
property.comment: Returns RAM usage as a percentage.

property.name: ProcessCpuUsage
property.comment: Returns CPU usage for the configured target process as a percentage.

property.name: CpuUsage
property.comment: Returns CPU usage as a percentage.

property.name: MaxRamUsageMB
property.comment: Returns the highest RAM usage in megabytes recorded since start or reset.

property.name: TargetProcessName
property.comment: Returns the current target process name. Returns an empty string if no process is configured.

property.name: MaxRamUsage
property.comment: Returns the highest RAM usage percentage recorded since start or reset.

property.name: MaxProcessRamUsageMB
property.comment: Returns the highest Process RAM usage in megabytes recorded.

property.name: RamTotal
property.comment: Returns total physical memory in bytes.

property.name: MaxCpuUsage
property.comment: Returns the highest CPU usage recorded since start or reset.

property.name: MaxProcessCpuUsage
property.comment: Returns the highest Process CPU usage recorded since the process was targeted or reset.

property.name: RamTotalGB
property.comment: Returns total physical memory in gigabytes.

property.name: ProcessRamUsage
property.comment: Returns RAM usage for the configured target process as a percentage of total system RAM.

property.name: ProcessRamUsageMB
property.comment: Returns RAM usage for the configured target process in megabytes.

field.name: Debug
field.comment: Enables diagnostic logging. When true internal debug messages are written to the B4J log.
